questions.question: According to Srila Prabhupada, those who are actually learned say that he who applies himself well to one of these paths achieves the results of _____.
questions.reference: SOURCE: Bg. 5.4 (purport) | QUOTE: 'Those who are actually learned say that he who applies himself well to one of these paths achieves the results of both.'

questions.question: The Personality of Godhead replied that ____ is better than renunciation of work.
questions.reference: SOURCE: Bg. 5.2 (translation) | QUOTE: 'But, of the two, work in devotional service is better than renunciation of work.'

questions.question: An intelligent person does not take part in the sources of misery, which are due to ____ with the material senses.
questions.reference: SOURCE: Bg. 5.22 (translation) | QUOTE: 'An intelligent person does not take part in the sources of misery, which are due to contact with the material senses.'

questions.question: Those whose minds are established in ____ and equanimity have already conquered the conditions of birth and death.
questions.reference: SOURCE: Bg. 5.19 (translation) | QUOTE: 'Those whose minds are established in sameness and equanimity have already conquered the conditions of birth and death.'

questions.question: One who neither hates nor desires the fruits of his activities is known to be always ____.
questions.reference: SOURCE: Bg. 5.3 (translation) | QUOTE: 'One who neither hates nor desires the fruits of his activities is known to be always renounced.'

questions.question: The ignorant speak of devotional service as being different from ____.
questions.answer: the analytical study of the material world
questions.reference: SOURCE: Bg. 5.4 (translation) | QUOTE: 'Only the ignorant speak of devotional service as being different from the analytical study of the material world.'

questions.question: Work in devotional service is better than ____ of work.
questions.reference: SOURCE: Bg. 5.2 (translation) | QUOTE: 'But, of the two, work in devotional service is better than renunciation of work.'

questions.question: Those who are situated in Brahman are ____ like Brahman.
questions.reference: SOURCE: Bg. 5.19 (translation) | QUOTE: 'They are flawless like Brahman, and thus they are already situated in Brahman.'

questions.question: An intelligent person does not delight in ____ pleasures.
questions.answer: those that have a beginning and an end
questions.reference: SOURCE: Bg. 5.22 (translation) | QUOTE: 'O son of Kuntī, such pleasures have a beginning and an end, and so the wise man does not delight in them.'

questions.question: One who is free from all dualities easily ____ material bondage.
questions.reference: SOURCE: Bg. 5.3 (translation) | QUOTE: 'Such a person, free from all dualities, easily overcomes material bondage and is completely liberated, O mighty-armed Arjuna.'

meta.query: provide answer from chapter 5 in bg
meta.refined_query:
Here is the refined search query:

`Bg. 5.*`

This query will search for all passages in Chapter 5 of the Bhagavad Gita, which can be used to create quiz questions.
